UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA
UNIVERSITY PARK
LOS ANGELES 7
March 31, 1959
Dr. Samuel L. Becker, Chairman
UABB Research Committee
106 Morningside Drive
Mew York 27, *Tew York
Dear Sam,
The forthcoming book on research methods in speech is being
edited by Clyde Dow of Michigan State University, I believe. I
heard about the volume through Milton Dickens of our institution,
who has prepared a chapter on experimental method.
Would it be proper for the Research Committee to send a little
summary of some of the recommendations or conclusions of the Ohio
State Research.Seminar when it distributes the next announcement
of grants-in-aid? Could the Committee conveniently and properly
offer its services in commenting upon proposals for funds of The
National Defense Education Act that members of UAEB may wish to
submit to the Committee? Would it be possible and proper for the
Committee to consider the feasibility of seeking further funds
and making larger grants? These are some of the questions that
occur to me as I read your letter of March 22. I am not sure that
these are the right kinds of questions to be asking, but I do feel
fairly sure that they are not wholly simple questions to answer.
Hereâ€™s hoping that your Easter season has been a happy one
and. that Mew York is treating you well.
Cordially,
Kenneth Harwood, Chairman
Department of Telecommunications
